name: Bombyx (itch)
description:
This is meant to be a tribute to the Amiga game Silkworm.

It is made for the DOS Games Fall Jam.

Currently it is a playable almost-level.  There are a couple of waves, then a boss.

Needs to run in DOSBox or similar. 

Arrow keys to move, SPACE to fire.

Tested in DOSBox-X and PCem.   Is pretty much playable on a PCem 386SX, but with a low framerate.
